projects.title: Event Buddy
projects.description: Event Buddy is a full-stack event booking system built with Next.js, NestJS, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, featuring secure JWT authentication.

projects.title: Text-Util
projects.description: TextUtils is a simple React-based text utility app that allows users to analyze and manipulate text.

projects.title: Survival-Game
projects.description: A 2D top-down survival game where enemies learn from your playstyle using Q-learning.

projects.title: DriveX
projects.description: Built a full-stack Flask-based ride booking system with MySQL backend.
